About Page

About Me And This Travel Blog

Hi! I’m a Durham College student currently pursuing a Computer Programming and Analysis course. I have a deep passion for technology and a zest for adventure. Combining these interests, I find joy in exploring new places and discovering different cultures, having traveled to over 20 countries. My travels have enriched my life with diverse experiences and perspectives that I love to share with others. Whether it’s travel tips or inspiration for your next adventure, you’ll find it here.

As a budding developer, I am constantly learning and applying new skills in my projects. My academic journey at Durham College has equipped me with a solid foundation in programming and problem-solving, preparing me to tackle complex challenges in the tech world. Stay tuned as I elaborate on my skills and projects on the next page.

If you'd like to reach out, feel free to email me at pratham.patel2@dcmail.ca.

Me As An Programmer

Welcome to the next chapter of my journey! Here, I dive into my skills and the projects I have worked on.

As an intern, I’ve had the opportunity to dive deep into the world of .NET frameworks. Whether it’s working with ASP.NET, MVC, or .NET Core, I’ve learned how to build robust and scalable applications. These experiences have equipped me with the know-how to develop efficient backend systems and seamless RESTful APIs. The structured environment of these frameworks has not only honed my technical skills but also sharpened my problem-solving abilities.

My passion for web development extends beyond the classroom. I’ve spent countless hours perfecting my craft with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create responsive, visually appealing websites. Tools like React and Angular have been my go-to for crafting dynamic and interactive web applications. Watching my ideas come to life on the screen is an exhilarating experience that fuels my creativity.

Another area I’m particularly excited about is Flutter application development. The ability to build natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase is nothing short of revolutionary. Flutter has allowed me to create cross-platform mobile apps that are not only functional but also user-friendly and visually stunning.

Programming Languages: I’m proficient in several programming languages, including Java, Python, JavaScript, and C#. Each language has its unique strengths, and I enjoy using them to develop innovative solutions that make a difference.

Version Control: Git has been an indispensable tool in my journey. It has taught me the importance of version control, collaboration, and efficient code management. This skill has been a cornerstone in both my academic and personal projects, ensuring smooth development processes.

Projects: Here are a few projects that I am particularly proud of:

  1. Travel Blog: This personal blog is where I share my travel experiences, tips, and photos from my adventures around the world. It showcases my skills in web development and content management.

  2. E-commerce Website: I developed a fully functional e-commerce website using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js). This project involved user authentication, product management, and payment integration, offering a comprehensive shopping experience.

  3. Weather App: This app provides real-time weather updates and forecasts for different locations, built using React and API integration. It’s a handy tool for anyone looking to stay updated on the weather.

My journey in the tech world is ongoing, and I’m always eager to learn new technologies and take on challenging projects. Connecting with like-minded individuals and contributing to exciting new ventures is something I greatly look forward to.
